title: Diamond Dazzle Bangles: Contemporary Kadas
materials: G-H color). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Elegant minimalist design with a slender rose gold band. Evenly spaced round brilliant cut diamonds are set in a bezel setting for a modern, secure hold and to enhance their brilliance. The Kadas have a sleek, open design for easy wear.
colors: Rose Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds
occasions: or as a sophisticated gift. Suitable for modern brides looking for minimalist bridal jewelry. Wearable for birthdays
anniversaries and other occasions where you want to have subtle shine.
description: A modern interpretation of the classic Kada, blending contemporary style with timeless elegance. The rose gold provides a warm, flattering tone, while the diamonds add a touch of luxury. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear, these bangles are a statement of refined taste.
